name: In The Lost Kingdom
description:
In The Lost Kingdom tells the story of a unsuccessful pack of thieves entangled in a world of ancient gods. Unintentionally they steal god Elion's Sacrifice and finally must face their own friends.

In The Lost kingdom features a full retro gameboy graphic and audio style as well as a developed Zelda-like battlesystem.

It was created for GBJam3 in August 2014.

Tools of the Trade are Unity 4.5, Visual Studio 2012/2013, beepbox, Cubase 5, sfxr, aseprite, SmartTimelapse and git.

Controls: Arrows and lctrl. M for Mute (menu only).
